output.sentences: Our friends wanted to spend the night taking pictures in different locations.
One of the first stops was at mcdonalds, where they took a photo with Ronald.
The next picture takes place at subway.
The next part of our journey takes place at the museum, in front of the sign.
The final picture was one our way home.
